title: My Amazing WeChat is Connected to the Three Realms - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Arrogant Characters   Chat Rooms   Cultivation   Devoted Love Interests   Immortals   Lucky Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple Realms   Weak Protagonist
author: Lángyān   Smoking Wolf   狼烟
description: Leo, a common middle school student, was accidentally invited to a Wechat group full of legendary immortals, such as the Monkey King, ErLang Sheng, the Dragon King of the East. Since that day, his life completely changed. With the mystical items receive from his WeChat group,>
